pageTitle: UPDATE – Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, October 20, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Metro Vancouver, British Columbia

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local school to mark Diwali and Bandi Chhor Divas with students.                    

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion on affordability.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with Iranian-Canadian settlement service workers.

Closed to media

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of British Columbia, John Horgan.

Closed to media

The Prime Minister will speak with the Mayor of Burnaby, Mike Hurley.
